price: 138. (Y) anuncia a los hipócritas (¡oh, Muhammad!) que recibirán un castigo doloroso;
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
